ComicInfo.Penciller: Adam Hughes,Mark Lipka,Rick Mays,Rick Mays,Mark Lipka,Adam Hughes
ComicInfo.Summary: Dragon and Alex track down the real culprit behind the decapitations - the mysterious costumed woman, Guillotine, a stripper who took out her frustrations on the clients that "touched" her. Dragon defeats Guillotine, and soon afterwards, the missing heads of the decapitated bodies are found in her apartment. Jennifer Murphy is freed from prison on account that she acted in self-defense and had no prior knowledge of her superhuman abilities. She is also awarded custody of her child, Angel, and Dragon resumes his rocky relationship with Rapture.
ComicInfo.Writer: Erik Larsen,Mary Bierbaum,Tom Bierbaum,Erik Larsen,Tom Bierbaum,Mary Bierbaum
ComicInfo.Title: Sex and Violence: Part 2
